title: Galio
body:
I like his new kit, but I hate his new visuals. He doesn't look like Galio anymore. His head looks unnatural, his wings don't look like a gargoyle's anymore, and his color scheme looks horrible. He looks like a statue a demacian would make, however I would have preferred them to change his place of origin than to change him into something completely different.

If he is good for the role I will still take him mid when my team needs a tank, but I won't enjoy the character as much overall anymore.

replies.body:
if he looks like a statue that a demacian would design then he has all of the criteria to be a gargoyle. the only other things would be that he's sitting on a building and being used as a fancy gutter both of which are negated by the fact that he's magically alive. not all gargoyles look like theyre monsters. his head looks like a person wearing jarvan's crown. his color scheme reflects the demacian color scheme.

besides all of that he looks a lot like a seraphimon in my mind with a few colors swapped and modified armor pieces.

http://th01.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/f/2013/092/b/5/seraphimon_by_sylvainfinrod-d6081eo.jpg

also reminds me of the lords of cinder from dark souls.

http://cdn.gamerant.com/wp-content/uploads/Yhorm-the-Giant-Dark-Souls-3-700x389.jpg


and king tryndameres crown 

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_L78zEKWCMII/TJe-8WfoFOI/AAAAAAAABBM/54APjwyhexw/s1600/Tryndamere_King.jpg

and maybe even a little bit of the belfry gargoyle.

http://i.ytimg.com/vi/tW5xbfr1gQo/maxresdefault.jpg
What could be nice is a traditional skin but riot doesn't make that anymore
He looks like some Dwarven Centurion from Elder Scrolls now, rather than a gargoyle. *sigh*
